title: Features
subtitle: Discover the powerful capabilities of QuizerJS

hero.title: Everything You Need to Build Interactive Quizzes
hero.description: QuizerJS provides a comprehensive solution for creating, managing, and displaying interactive quizzes with Editor.js integration and modern Web Components.

editorjsIntegration.title: Editor.js Integration
editorjsIntegration.description: Integrate QuizerJS as an Editor.js tool plugin.
details: Works as a native Editor.js block tool
Supports all Editor.js features (undo/redo, copy/paste, etc.)

multipleTypes.title: Multiple Question Types
multipleTypes.description: Support for various question types to meet different quiz requirements.

dsl.title: DSL Specification
dsl.description: Unified DSL format for storage, transmission, and validation.

themeSystem.title: Theme System
themeSystem.description: Flexible theme system with multiple built-in themes and custom theme support.
details: Multiple built-in themes (light, dark, solarized, etc.)

frameworkIntegration.title: Framework Integration
frameworkIntegration.description: Works with React, Vue, Svelte, and vanilla JS.

typeSafety.title: Type Safety
typeSafety.description: Complete TypeScript support with comprehensive type definitions.

modular.title: Modular Design
modular.description: Use core components independently with flexible configuration.
modular.codeExample:
import { QuizPlayer } from '@quizerjs/core';
// Use independently without Editor.js

responsive.title: Responsive Design
responsive.description: Works on all devices and screen sizes.
